Key Match Events: David Miller and Aiden Markram set the momentum and led the Proteas to a 5-wickets victory.
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets but could not save the game.
Suryakumar Yadav hit a half-century but no other batter could score more than 20 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: Virender Sehwag compared South Africa win to 2011 World Cup match.
Virat Kohli said they need to be consistent in their performance.
Lungi Ngidi expressed his joy over helping the country win a game at the World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Perth, Australia.
South Africa's Lungi Ngidi took 4 wickets for 29 runs in the Indian innings.
India's Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 25 runs in the South African innings.
